resources:
WFI2017 Lets me ask you few questions, before you get started.
1. What is your name ?
2. Your Gender ?
3. How old are you?
4. Input your weight (In Kg.)
5. Enter Your Height
6. Choose you activity :
Little or no exercise
Little exercise/sports 1–3 days/week
Moderate exercise/sports 3–5 days/week
Hard exercise/sports 6–7 days/week //Profile_Menu Edit
